sample_generations.prompt:
Poems by Chag027

Road least travelled

by Chag027 on July 16, 2023.  © chirag
tired,
I tried
to follow the same road
the comfort, a bit of hurt
the scent of a familiar word.

hopeless,
I ran
through the same road
trying to figure out the boat
that has long sailed, so I thought.

tired and hopeless
I tried to run
even with heartburn.

And it mattered,
as the sun floats,
and the trees stood,
all along, waiting to welcome
to be welcomed
in that two-way street of peace and redemption.


A glitch

by Chag027 on October 13, 2021.  © chirag
As they crack the bridge,
a little bit of scratch begins with a hitch.
Take a step ahead,
but not too quick.
Let the sand spill a bit more,
let the faith have this score.

As they crack the bridge,
take a step back when you see a hitch.
Sand spills a bit more,
time bleeds through the pores.
Let it happen as it must,
in the end, everything is just..


(less)Hope

by Chag027 on August 29, 2021.  © chirag
It lurks in the shadow,
It still crawls through the light
a reminder of the broken bridges,
of choices they made
to create it with hollow ridges.
Yet, clinging on to the memory;
for pride or is it just ego?
Unknowingly dishonoring the present,
in the hope to mend what was never lost.


Hope

by Chag027 on August 7, 2021.  © chirag
Through the darkest hours,
in the brightest times
when thoughts betray you
when nights became a war zone
when heart refuse to pump more blood
just breath.

Through the brightest days,
in the darkest times
when words suffocate you
when love became just another word
when head hurts with every breath
just breath.

Just one more breath;
Just one more day;
Just one more night away,
stood the answers
when it will all make sense.


Contradiction

by Chag027 on April 8, 2021.  © chirag
There are no plain streams;
that you can swim through
and travel the distance
between you and the desired.
There are no plain roads;
that you can choose to reach
to a place, you can call home.
There are no clear skies;
even when you hide beneath
the blanket of spring.
Scary as it is,
beauty in life is not, the grass greener;
but it is about the scars beneath it.


Colour of cold

by Chag027 on April 6, 2021.  © chirag
Jammed in the silence,
trembling in a room filled with empty ticks:
We hold hands.
To search a missing piece
of the puzzle,
we drifted a bit closer.
Inevitable it was,
as we traveled back,
through the lane called past.
Walking under the nostalgic skies,
I stared down at myself,
counting up the years.
Of all mistakes we encountered
the most painful were the ones
build at a backyard;
where lived a shadow.
A familiar taste of guilt,
reeks in the air,
choking the present
yet so comfortable to rage.
Strolling in the lane,
this silhouette
had a pair of hands,
one of which I held onto.

Author notes

Prompt used:

“What do you do when you know you could be awful too?”



Memoir

by Chag027 on March 25, 2021.  © chirag
Searching for a dock in this chaos called life,
we all ran with an invisible drive.
With different pace we travel,
in not so distant past the pieces unravel.
The stories were way out of line,
yet their presence seems to rhyme.
They hold on to each other,
in times of bad weather.
The puzzle of each still incomplete,
yet unknowingly they were perfect fit.
As the road diverged;
each took a different path,
with a puzzle bit more complete.

Author notes

To the ones who stayed.



Spring

by Chag027 on February 21, 2021.  © chirag
Wind whooshing past the grass,
earth hugging daffodils blanket
like a wave, it swings playfully.

Sun sneaking behind the clouds,
with warm eyes gazing
beneath the flowers.

Just a seasonal show,
between the two.
Stranded in their own distant world;
held by an invisible word.


Same Mistake

by Chag027 on February 3, 2021.  © chirag
Unsure of this rain,
how did it feel in pain?
Was it the same tickling?
Or was it numb?

That regenerated skin
over a wound;
I remember the numbness..
the nothingness.

Curious and furious,
like a clueless firefly;
I came closer to
unavoidable void.

Just to feel something,
I tore a layer.
After a long time,
it felt light.

As the clouds began to drift off:
Like an old friend's goodbye,
came piercing pain,
Now I'm sure it was neither rain nor pain.

Author notes

Quote "They say ignorance is bliss....they’re wrong."



Is it really worth it?

by Chag027 on December 14, 2020.  © chirag
Warm rain drops
of first fall,
Cold sunlight
in the shades if summer,
Hot coffee
in the blanket of freezing wind,
soft kiss on forehead
after everlasting battle of breathing.
Things I had; I cherish.
never would have I given up on.

Yet I sit alone now
closed within the walls
damp and dark
of my own prison.
created by my own
t"reason".



Author notes


#5
"I'm tough, I'm ambitious and I know exactly what I want,
if that makes me a bitch, okay."



Withered

by Chag027 on November 13, 2020.  © chirag
Like a feather,
floating through the air
time passed a little bit slower.
With each gush of emotion,
it moved,
from one direction
to another.

Like the autumn leaves,
it went down.
As it drew closer,
to what seemed destiny;
a small fragile hand
got hold of the piece.

On a missing puzzle,
to search for meaning,
it merged..
creating a reflection
to started
yet another riddle.


Warrior

by Chag027 on October 16, 2020.  © chirag
In too deep we went to fight.
For our reap;
We weep;
We sweep.

The charioteer, still do not heed
it asks for more.

Fighting against dagger of words;
it reasons the burst : Unjust yet you must.

Somehow, somewhere the back bleeds;
just one more fleet.
Still they do not heed.

Yet, we go for the faith we owe;
to the place we know
In too deep,
we go..


No lone survivor

by Chag027 on July 31, 2020.  © chirag
Drowning in the shallow truth,
invisible mud of lies beneath;
pulling me down,
like falling in love.
It felt so good:
with the ides of past;
knowing somewhere down the line
that everything that rhymes
doesn't really is part of your hymn.

It's a puddle of mud,
which eventually will settle.

Its just a gamble.
In the end
only thing that matters is,
which end stays
and remembering that
you can be on either side.


Mess

by Chag027 on July 23, 2020.  © chirag
Wings supposed to fly,
when teethered to the one;
dreaming in the illusion of perfect some.
Given the opportunity to explore,
the deepest fear implores
and swing around the same tree.
When it withers,
surprised,
we act on the impluse
knowing deep down
it was bound to happen.
Not just once,
as it's just one messy journey
that you got.
You just have to figure out,
the darkest lanes and
which mess you belong to.

Author notes

prompt 7 - even it up



Freedom

by Chag027 on July 19, 2020.  © chirag
Beneath the clouds,
above the grey,
without a way,
we rode away.

Tearing through the wind,
clinging to this fringe,
we rev through stray.

The beast growl
with adrenaline,
rushing through the vein.

And just for a second
we felt no pain.

Author notes

Just another bike ride story.



Undone

by Chag027 on April 3, 2020.  © chirag
As the dusk entered,
gentle music filled the room,
a bit of antidote, to start the mood,
a bit of dance, to ease the ruse.

Some words were exchanged,
long forgotten memories faced.

One moment after another,
as they got closer,
Yet one more sip of elixir,
with a sense of pleasure,
things started with few games.

Her smooth shoulders,
caressed with his rugged hands.
They started melting
in each other's grace.
Few hand strokes,
soaring into the depths of numbness;
as this moment stands still.
With no guilt or terror,
they climb on one another
and without flinching
drown into one another.
In the depths of pain
one felt the fame while
other somewhat to blame.

Author notes

Gin



Final call

by Chag027 on April 2, 2020.  © chirag
Ashes in the sky,
struggling to rise high.
Fiddling with the tide;
it just arrived, with a message
of approaching Strom.
Not that it was fleeing from it,
nor was it running towards it.
Just an accidental encounter,
with the past of this hunter
revealed the nature of man's blunder.
Now it is on a journey,
to warn those who listen.

Author notes

Nature



Confusion

by Chag027 on March 19, 2020.  © chirag
A warm breeze,
drifting lightly through the grease.
Like a crescent cloud
in a dark night,
I waited for the leash,
to grab the wishes of sneeze.

As the leaves fell one after another;
I waited for the fallen star
to fulfil the wish of that warm breeze.

Gloomy sky's, envisaged
freedom of gleamy slice.
Time is passing,
yet I'm still stuck in the winter,
waiting for spring to find its way
through the fog of confusion.


Dopamine effect

by Chag027 on March 6, 2020.  © chirag
Grounded by the dawn;
trembling for one more smoke.
As the body yelled for help;
thoughts wandered on past
lighting one more out of life.
One step closer to the end;
just one thought;
steadily stomping all the others.
Withered;
slithered,
the shadow of light
still behind for one last fight.

Searching for..
just one more light,
just one more night,
another place to hide.


Compass

by Chag027 on February 11, 2020.  © chirag
He drifted;
drizzling towards that freedom,
to greener grass;
that looks better through grease.

Dancing in freezing cold,
to get ride of feeling;
accompanied with the riddle,
he sought to heed.

Drowsing in little warmth,
trying to reap through half cooked deeds.

Staring up to the glimmering stars,
agonizing over dream that sits:
beneath the fog of rationalization.


Drunk

by Chag027 on February 5, 2020.  © chirag
Holding a bottle in his hand,
he stroll down the path of band.
Grizzly heap with drowned blood;
he stood there while they tore the thug.
Thug indeed was just a man
judged by cover.
He saw through the book,
even blurry, his experienced eyes saw the look.
With the strength he had;
he threw the bottle up ahead.
Misdirected flight strike the thug,
boucing unconscious,
person of interest.

The heard look at the vigilante,
praising the hero, they walked away.

Shocked; his adrenaline then rush back
to his brain.
Now he ran in vain,
to the thug, who
was just an uncommon man,
trying hard to feed against odds.

He shook the thug, woke him up
and sat down with a hug.
That's all was needed by the thug
his super hero wore no rug.

Author notes

For me super hero is anyone who helped a person in need without any intention. Kindness is the super power everyone needs.



Sight

by Chag027 on February 3, 2020.  © chirag
Graced with light,
she travelled in desolation.
Through the hive ;
she walked through shallow.
not for hallowed fame;
but to find herself closer
in the frame.

Hiding in plain sight
few caught her site.
The first tide was
far from perfect to fight.

She went deeper to dive;
